Headline: Temporary Westbound #7 Harrison Reroute near Harrison/Wood
ShortDescription: Westbound 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted Harrison/Wood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Ashland, Polk, Wood, Harrison, and resume normal route due to street blockage near Harrison/Wood.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
